name: G-Max Wildfire
effect: The Fire-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Flare while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Additionally, deal 1 Damage against all foes at the end of each Round, fire-types are immune to this damage. Lasts 4 turns.
description: The user blasts out a flame that almost has a mind of its own, quickly swirling around the opposition.
